bug.author: fareeha
bug.summary: AC for TF missing symbols on Linux
bug.description:
Symbols not found on Linux. Works on Mac. <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "run_ac_linux.py", line 77, in <module> prediction_window=50, _advanced_parameters={'use_tensorflow':True}) File "/task_runtime/venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/turicreate/toolkits/activity_classifier/_activity_classifier.py", line 187, in create import turicreate.toolkits.libtctensorflow ImportError: /task_runtime/venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/turicreate/toolkits/libtctensorflow.so: undefined symbol: _ZTIN4turi10neural_net15compute_contextE </denchmark-code>
GCC demangler conversion: typeinfo for turi::neural_net::compute_context
